comment.author: 11572312@N00

comment._content: He sure resembles commissioner Dougherty, but given the man nearby in swimming trunks and others bundled in coats, might this be a winter swimming photo op? See negative from Dec. 1912, www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2497226638/ and the Coney Island Polar Bear Club history, www.polarbearclub.org/polarbears/history.htm
